verses.text: The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;+ 20.1 defend…: Heb. set thee on an high place*
Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;+ 20.2 thee help: Heb. thy help*+ 20.2 strengthen: Heb. support*
Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.+ 20.3 accept: Heb. turn to ashes: or, make fat*
Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.
We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our* banners: the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** fulfil all thy petitions.

Now know I that the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.+ 20.6 his holy…: Heb. the heaven of his holiness*+ 20.6 with…: Heb. by the strength of the salvation of*
Some trust* in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** our God.
They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
Save, \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: let the king hear us when we call.
